summary: Drops the weights of all scrolls from 0.5 to 0.1. Supports *only* Czech, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Russian, and Spanish.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Lightweight Scrolls

Version: 1.1 (11/95/2012)

By: JustinOther

Description: Drops the weights of all scrolls (including DLC and mod added if SKSE is installed) from 0.5 to 0.1. Supports *only* Czech, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Russian and Spanish. If you would like support for another language, please PM me.

Install: Dragondrop Lightweight Scrolls.esp and Lightweight Scrolls.bsa into Skyrim\\Data and activate the plugin with the load order utility of your choice.

Uninstall: Open your console and enter \"StopQuest LightweightPotionsQUST\", then save and deactivate the plugin.

Conflicts: Anything that edits scrolls will probably conflict with this.

Uninstall: Open your console and enter \"StopQuest LightweightScrollsQUST\", then save and deactivate the plugin.

Thanks: Bethesda for Skyrim/Creation Kit. MaboroshiDaikon for Skyrim String Localizer. The *Edit Team for TES5Edit.


Se also: [i][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1036]Lightweight Potions and Poisons[/url][/i]. It\'s also multilingual, supporting the same nine languages.

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: JustinOther
